text:
Did you ever make secret bases or something
like that when you were little, Natsuha?
No, this is my first time.

It was a very meaningful experience... It's amazing how
sturdy cardboard becomes when rolled into a tube!

It doesn't collapse even when people sit on it...
It could even be used for chair legs...

Will we have homemade chairs in the next secret base,
I wonder... What about the location?

Inside the park's drainage pipes, the jungle gym,
or maybe another cardboard house...?
Haha, did you do some research?
Do you have any other ideas?

Then we'll need to select a suitable tree first.
I wonder if there are any around here...

There are plenty of impressive trees,
so we should find one.

Oh...
But climbing trees might be tough for everyone...
...Oh, it might not be that difficult after all.
